Python Module for Ancient Indian Mathematics and Astronomy
1. Aryabhata Cryptographic Calculator
	i)Calculate values from cryptographic words.
	ii)Generate cryptographic words from numbers.
2. Square Root When the Smaller Square Root is Known (Using Bodhaayana Approximation Method)
3. Roots (Bhaskara Method)
	i) Square Root
	ii) Cube Root
4. Solar Eclipse Calculator (Improved Siddhantic Procedure)
5. Lunar Eclipse Calculator (Improved Siddhantic Procedure)
